original_text: And they said unto me, The remnant that are left of the captivity there in the province are in great affliction and reproach: the wall of Jerusalem also is broken down, and the gates thereof are burned with fire.
korean_text: 그들이 내게 이르되 사로잡힘을 면하고 남아 있는 자들이 그 지방 거기에서 큰 환난을 당하고 능욕을 받으며 예루살렘 성은 허물어지고 성문들은 불탔다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: The remnant that are left of the captivity
are in great affliction and reproach
the wall of Jerusalem also is broken down
and the gates thereof are burned with fire
